tools.name: AWS Cost Explorer
tools.description: Tool that enables visualization, understanding, and management of AWS costs and usage over time, helping identify cost-saving opportunities

tools.name: Azure Cost Management
tools.description: Set of tools for monitoring, allocating, and optimizing Azure cloud costs with transparency, accuracy, and efficiency

tools.name: Google Cloud Cost Management
tools.description: Suite of tools that help you monitor, control, and optimize your Google Cloud costs with detailed reports and recommendations

tools.name: Apptio Cloudability
tools.description: Multi-cloud financial management platform that provides visibility, optimization, and governance for cloud resources

tools.name: CloudHealth by VMware
tools.description: Cloud management platform for monitoring, analyzing, and managing cloud cost, usage, performance, and security

tools.name: AWS Security Hub
tools.description: Service that provides a comprehensive view of security alerts and compliance status across AWS accounts

tools.name: Microsoft Defender for Cloud
tools.description: Unified infrastructure security management system that strengthens the security posture of your data centers and provides protection against threats

tools.name: Google Security Command Center
tools.description: Comprehensive security management and risk platform for Google Cloud that provides visibility into cloud assets, vulnerabilities, and threats

tools.name: Prisma Cloud
tools.description: Cloud-native security platform that provides visibility and threat protection across cloud environments, infrastructure, and applications

tools.name: Lacework
tools.description: Cloud security platform that automates cloud security across build time, runtime threats, and cloud configurations

tools.name: AWS CloudFormation
tools.description: Service for modeling and setting up AWS resources, enabling infrastructure as code with automated provisioning and updates

tools.name: Azure Resource Manager
tools.description: Deployment and management service that provides a consistent management layer to create, update, and delete resources in your Azure subscription

tools.name: Google Cloud Deployment Manager
tools.description: Infrastructure deployment service that automates the creation and management of Google Cloud resources using templates

tools.name: Pulumi
tools.description: Infrastructure as code platform that enables creating, deploying, and managing cloud infrastructure using familiar programming languages

tools.name: Cloudify
tools.description: Open source multi-cloud orchestration platform that automates cloud infrastructure setup, deployment, management, and scaling

tools.name: Amazon CloudWatch
tools.description: Monitoring and observability service that provides data and insights to monitor applications, respond to performance changes, and optimize resource utilization

tools.name: Azure Monitor
tools.description: Comprehensive solution for collecting, analyzing, and acting on telemetry from your cloud and on-premises environments

tools.name: Google Cloud Monitoring
tools.description: Service that provides visibility into the performance, uptime, and overall health of cloud-powered applications

tools.name: Datadog
tools.description: Monitoring service for cloud-scale applications, providing observability of servers, databases, tools, and services through a SaaS-based platform

tools.name: Dynatrace
tools.description: AI-powered monitoring solution that provides automatic and intelligent observability across hybrid multi-cloud environments
